WEIGHT-COACHING-INELIGIBLE.header: As a government insurance beneficiary, you cannot sign up for the weight loss program at Zealthy.
listItems: Due to regulations, if you have government insurance, you cannot sign up for the weight loss program at Zealthy.
If your insurance status changes at any time and you are no longer a government insurance beneficiary, you may sign up or email us at support@getzealthy.com and we can help.
